sentences.english: Chapter four sum up the basic characteristic and the last sum up great meaning of Ren Bishi's Party building thought.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要阐述任弼时的党建思想的重大意义。

sentences.english: The magnet force side between your molecules is negligibly smvirtuingly ingl.
sentences.chinese: 分子间的吸收力小得可以大意不计。

sentences.english: High school Chinese classroom to raise teaching of reviewing etc. teaching quality of Chinese there is a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 高中语文课堂反思性教学对提高教学质量有重大意义。

sentences.english: Or it can be part of a great meaning.
sentences.chinese: 或它也可能是伟大意义的意思的一部分。

sentences.english: It’s the best advertisement for advertising there is.
sentences.chinese: 这是广告中最佳的广告。写作方法与文章大意

sentences.english: It is important to evaluate the combat efficiency of C4ISR system.
sentences.chinese: 对指挥自动化系统进行作战效能评估具有重大意义。

sentences.english: Carelessness deserves the blame for many accidents.
sentences.chinese: 许多事故归咎于粗心大意。

sentences.english: The typist received an admonition from the supervisor for being careless.
sentences.chinese: 那个打字员因粗心大意受到监督人的训诫。

sentences.english: The significance of the huge foreign-exchange reserves lies elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 巨额外汇储备的重大意义在于其它方面。

sentences.english: The significance of the event does, indeed, seem vouchsafed.
sentences.chinese: 这个事件看起来确实具有重大意义。

sentences.english: Career experts suggest erring on the side of caution.
sentences.chinese: 职业专家倡议，宁可功于谨严也不要大意。

sentences.english: Unfortunately since you have already canceled the hosting we cannot re-instate this account.
sentences.chinese: 大意好像是你把账户注销了，但是他们不能帮你恢复。

sentences.english: "Hezhe" belongs to the language system of "Mundarin", It means "the oriental people".
sentences.chinese: “赫哲”是满语，大意是指“东方的人们”。

sentences.english: His long period of association with Jennie had made him incautious .
sentences.chinese: 他因跟珍妮同居日久，已经什么事都大意了。

sentences.english: A golden cross may mean something or it might just be a coincidence.
sentences.chinese: 黄金交叉或许有重大意义，又或许只是巧合而已。
